info.author: Fredrik Corneliusson
info.description:
Transolution is a Computer Aided Translation (CAT) suite supporting the XLIFF
standard. It provides the open source community with features and concepts that
have been used by commercial offerings for years to improve translation
efficiency and quality. The suite is modular to make it flexible and provides an
XLIFF Editor, translation memory engine and filters to convert different formats
to and from XLIFF. The use of XLIFF means that almost any content can be
localized as long as there is a filter for it (XML, SGML, PO, RTF,
StarOffice/OpenOffice, etc.).
info.name: Transolution
info.summary: Translation Suite built around XLIFF standard.
